author: belforte
body: @smuzaffar @amaltaro I propose to allow new CRAB DevOp @mapellidario (who will be with use next 3 years) to merge PR's on COMP branches. Hope it is OK with you. As you may now Daina will leave at end of year so having another person to cover for CRAB is good. No hurry to remove Daina, of course. BYW I thing Natalia Ratnikova is not active on CMS anymore.
title: adding DarioMapelli
